params.participantIndex: The index of the participant submitting data, (found using index(address)).
The index of the participant submitting data, (found using index(address)).

params.participant: Address of the participant to compute the challenge
params.r: The value R - k * G, used in sigma as part of the participants proof of knowledge.

params.channelKey: Public Key used to encrypt data to send to this participant.
params.commitment: A list of threshold points committing to each of the participants                   function coefficients, (commitment[i] == coefficient[i] * G).
params.participantIndex: The index of the participant submitting data, (found using index(address)).
params.sigma: Proof of knowledge of the first coefficient given the commitment.

params.encryptedFunctionOutputs: The participants polynomial function run on each participants index,                                 (counting from 1). Each function output is encrypted using the                                 the corresponding participants encryption key.
params.participantIndex: The index of the participant submitting data, (found using index(address)).
The index of the participant submitting data, (found using index(address)).

channelKeys().notice: Returns the list of participant channel keys,         used to send encrypted function outputs between participants.

commitments().notice: Returns an `(n x t)` array of submitted polynomial coefficient commitments.         where `t` is the threshold and `n` the number of participants.

deprecateKey(uint256).notice: Called by a participant to mark the key as deprecated, should be used if the         participants secret key has been leaked.

failKeyGeneration(uint256).notice: Called by a participant if they need to fail the ceremony due to failure of a stage.

functionOutputs(uint256).notice: List of encrypted function outputs evaluated on the current participant index.         [encrypted(f_0(participantIndex)), encrypted(f_1(participantIndex))....]

index(address).notice: Returns the index of a specific participant.

init(address[],uint256).notice: Used to initialize the key generation ceremony         as part of the proxy pattern.

participantChallenge(address,(uint256,ui.notice: Used by a participant to construct the proof of knowledge of its first coefficient.

participants().notice: Returns the list of participants involved in the ceremony.

publicKey().notice: Returns the Public Key created after         completion of the key generation ceremony.

shareCommitments(uint256,(uint256,uint25.notice: Used to submit commitments, sigma and channelKey.

shareFunctionOutputs(uint256,(uint256,(u.notice: Used to the output of this participants function evaluated on each participants index.

state().notice: Returns the current state of the key generation ceremony.The key should not be used before the state is set to active.Any participant can "deprecate" the key at any time as a warning         to other participants that the key should not be used.

state(uint256).notice: Returns the participant level state in the key generation ceremony.

threshold().notice: Returns the threshold defined for this ceremony,         defines the number of participants required to create         a valid signature.

validateFunctionOutputs(uint256).notice: Used to validate that all the function outputs operated on this participants index are         as expected.
